 @ Data used in                                                                                  @
 @ Martin Lettau and Sydney Ludvigson "Consumption, Aggregat Wealth and Expected Stock Returns"  @
 @ and                                                                                           @
 @ Martin Lettau and Sydney Ludvigson "Resurrecting the (C)CAPM: A Cross-Sectional Test When 	 @
 @                                     Risk Premia Are Time-Varying" 				 @
 @																								 @
 @ See papers for a detailed description of the data.  Variables are in natural logs.  Missing   @
 @ values are denoted as -99.                                                                    @
 @ date: 9/16/99                                                                                 @
 
 @ ****** IMPORTANT ********                                                                     @ 
 @ The wealth variable is measured at the BEGINNING OF PERIOD, e.g. the observation              @
 @ in 1953Q1 is wealth as of January 1 1953!							 @
 @ This convention is different from the standard timing convention used to compute              @
 @ dividend-price ratios, which uses END OF PERIOD variables.                                    @
 
 @ Quarter consumption c  asset wealth a  labor income y    cay= c-0.3054a-0.5891y               @
